mapper.insert: insert into musicboard_article(article_no, id, title, text, file_name, album_file, read_count, best, bad) values(mb_article_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{text}, #{fileName}, #{albumFile},0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select article_no from (select article_no from musicboard_article where id = #{id} ORDER BY article_no desc) where ROWNUM <= 1

select * from ( select * from ( select rownum as rnum, A.* from ( select * from musicboard_article order by article_no desc ) A where rownum <= #{end}) B where B.rnum >= #{start}) join (select id, nickname from member) using (id)
select read_count from musicboard_article where article_no = #{articleNo}
select nvl(max(article_no), #{articleNo}) from(select * from musicboard_article where article_no < #{articleNo})
select nvl(min(article_no), #{articleNo}) from(select * from musicboard_article where article_no > #{articleNo})
select best from musicboard_article where article_no = #{articleNo}
select bad from musicboard_article where article_no = #{articleNo}
mapper.update: update musicBoard_article set read_count = #{readCount} where article_no = #{articleNo}
update musicboard_article set best = #{best} where article_no =#{articleNo}
